sen.e: Triggered by this incident, the Hogen-no-ran (the disturbance in the Hogen era) broke out between the Goshirakawa Emperor side and the the retired Emperor Sutoku side.

sen.cmt: 用語集より、保元の乱→Hogen Rebellion としました。Retired大文字にしました。

sen.j: この乱で勝利した天皇は忠通に東三条殿を返還した。
sen.e: The emperor who wan this disturbance returned Higashi Sanjo-dono Residence to Tadamichi.

sen.j: その後、忠通の娘・藤原聖子（皇嘉門院）、続いて嫡男の近衛基実に譲られたが、仁安元年（1166年）12月に当時皇太子憲仁親王（後の高倉天皇）の御所であった東三条殿は火災で焼失、以後は再建されずに荒廃した。
sen.e: After that, its ownership was trandferred to his duaghter, FUJIWARA no Kiyoko (Kokamonin), and then to his heir, Motozane KONOE, but in December of 1166, when Imperial Prince Norihito, the crown prince (and later Takakura Emperor), lived there, Higashi Sanjo-dono Residence took a fire and was destroyed, and has been in ruins thereafter without being reconstructed.
